comments:
Build ID: 3.3M4 (I20061214-1445)

Steps To Reproduce:
Generated Manageable Endpoint (Axis2-J2EE server) code using Btm-Muse tools. None of the "Relationship..." capabilities (Management Capabilities => Relationships or Relationship Resource) is selected.

Deploying the generated code onto Tomcat 5.5 nevertheless yields the exception:

...
IWAT0725E Cannot get relationships
java.lang.Exception: [ID = 'PropertyNotInSchema'] There is no property named '{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsdm/muws2-2.xsd}Relationship' defined in the schema. A property should not have any operations or metadata applied to it if it is not in the WS-RP document.org.apache.muse.ws.addressing.soap.SoapFault: [ID = 'PropertyNotInSchema'] There is no property named '{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsdm/muws2-2.xsd}Relationship' defined in the schema. Other than the exception there seems to be no adverse effect, i.e. the server starts nevertheless...

Michael
This is only a warning statement. It will get relationships if it is a relationship resource. It won't otherwise. Possibly, we will show this as a warning in the PDE Error log.
This isn ow shown int he error log.
